name: Kaya
description:
Pull. Push.
Pull. Push.



Kaya is a colorful 2D mouse-only logic game.
There are special square and circle blocks, who was created to fulfil it's own destiny depending on its color.
You can control situation on board by activating them.

  • Observe the situation.
  • Conclude the right activating order.
  • Collect all gems.
  • Solve the level.
  • Get better in process of doing it.
  • Repeat!



Also Kaya is a delicious coconut jam originated in South-West Asia, that somehow inspired me to develop this game!
